metadata.description: The path to redemption is never easy, and the journey of a warrior princess seeking to wash the blood of innocents from her hands is no exception.   Xena travels to Athens, to plead for redemption in the temple of Eleos. But some things can never be forgiven and the shadows of past sins are long.  Will Xena find redemption or betrayal waiting for her in the temple of the gods?  The power, the passion, the danger... her courage would change the world.  Xena:  Warrior Princess.
metadata.name: Xena: Warrior Princess Vol. 4
